title: Hui Liu
description: Name in Chinese is 回留蔬食. Long-time operating teahouse and vegetarian food restaurant. Nice, traditional Taiwanese teahouse atmosphere with lots of decorative teapots and natural building materials. Fine green teas. Prices moderate for Taipei Da-an area, around NT280 for a bowl of sesame sauce noodle, NT480 for a set meal (soup, salad, main, dessert, tea). Little park with shady trees in front. Near Da-an park, YongKang park and YongKang night market.
streetAddress: 9, Lane 31, Yung Kang Street, Da-an District
